parameters.name: Description
parameters.description: The description of the IPv6 gateway.

parameters.name: Ipv6GatewayId
parameters.description: The ID of the IPv6 gateway that you want to modify.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description:
The name of the IPv6 gateway.

It must be 2 to 256 characters in length, and can contain letters, digits, periods (.), underscores (\_), and hyphens (-). It must start with a letter. The name must start with a letter but cannot start with `http://` or `https://`.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region where the IPv6 gateway is deployed. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~36063~~) operation to query the most recent region list.
